OrgName.entry: PHYSIOCARE - PHYSIOTHERAPY, ACUPUNCTURE AND SPORTS INJURY CLINIC

Desc.entry: State registered and chartered physiotherapist and acupuncturist and member of the British Acupuncture Council. Treats muscle and skeletal disorders including: sports injuries, orthopaedic conditions, spinal problems, stress incontinence, posture and provides advice on lifting. Also provides acupuncture for: pain relief, stress, eating disorders, gynaecological conditions, arthritis, facial revitalisation, smoking and other addictions. Treatment for patients with neurological disorders can be arranged. Physiotherapy and acupuncture treatments cost approximately Â£30-33 for sessions of 45 minutes. Discounts available for students and sports injuries. Please contact for up-to-date details of prices. Home visits available. Area covering Ecclesall, Sheffield West.
